p: Marriott and co-workers contributed a number of technical solutions and strategies to achieve better resolution of aroma compounds. Their successful implementation of a number of hybrid GC approaches in a single instrument [ 8, 9, 10, 11, 12] represents qualitative and quantitative developments to provide a convenient solution to overcome uncertainty of data correlation across multiple hyphenated systems. The use of cryogenic trapping and modulators, with flow switching explored by the group [ 17, 18, 19, 20], allows the focussing and/or concentration of the volatile analytes in various modes of operation, which improves separation peak capacity and enhances the quality of analyte characterisation.
